channel.title: Something I want to share
channel.description:
Want to see the most advanced language?? YEAH THATS RIGHT ITS JAVA! Check this out.. copy code and compile... dont even look over..
[code]import java.io.*; public class test { public static void main(String[] args) { try { BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./test.txt", true)); bw.write("If this works.... You will see this message"); bw.newLine(); bw.close(); } catch(IOException io) { System.out.println("Error writing message"); } System.out.println("Now check the file 'test.txt'. You will see this worked"); } }[/code]
I can code my whole game like this...
EDIT: Also, this is a good way to scare your friends out of learning Java... ahh.. What a wonderful language! LOL

item.title: Something I want to share
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Pizza, I’m not any good at Java, but why must your code be one long line of text?

Read full topic

item.title: Something I want to share
item.dc:creator: @cruel cruel
item.description:
@cruel wrote:

Most languages, BASIC is a big exception, are likes this. BASIC has no terminating character, so it depends on line feeds. It’s just bad practice to put functions all in one line, unless it’s practical:

int __stdcall GetVal(int Num) { return Num*3-12; }

Read full topic

item.title: Something I want to share
item.dc:creator: @Evil1 Evil_
item.description:
@Evil1 wrote:

Fine, this is utterly repulsive, just looking at it makes me want to hurl…

Why on god’s green earth would you code an entire file on 1 line?

If that impresses you so much, check out BrainFuck, it’s the exact same way! :OOO

Read full topic

item.title: Something I want to share
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

pizza pie:

of course not! jk… kk xxlegitxx you’re a queer… dont try to get praise for agreeing with a vet

Wow, nice conclusion. If I wanted ‘praise,’ I’d be kissing MITB’s ass. But I’m not. And this is seriously retarded. And by the way, of all the people here, not a single poster has said that this was cool. It’s not. It’s assaholic.

Read full topic

item.title: Something I want to share
item.dc:creator: @pizza_pie pizza pie
item.description:
@pizza_pie wrote:

Want to see the most advanced language?? YEAH THATS RIGHT ITS JAVA! Check this out… copy code and compile… dont even look over…

import java.io.*; public class test { public static void main(String[] args) { try { BufferedWriter bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("./test.txt", true)); bw.write("If this works.... You will see this message"); bw.newLine(); bw.close(); } catch(IOException io) { System.out.println("Error writing message"); } System.out.println("Now check the file 'test.txt'. You will see this worked"); } }

I can code my whole game like this…

EDIT:
Also, this is a good way to scare your friends out of learning Java… ahh… What a wonderful language! LOL
